member.name: T:Syncfusion.Blazor.ProgressBar.SfProgressBar
member.summary: Specifies the progress bar rendering functionality.
The progress bar control is used to indicates the progress of a task with built-in features like rectangular and circular shapes, determinate and indeterminate states, segments, and more.

member.summary: Method invoked when the component is ready to start.
